rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I think the world would be better off
if we didn't have Blades.

rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I'll have you know my family was killed
by Superbian Blades!

rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Every Blade in Alst is controlled
by Acedia. So really, it's Acedia that's
responsible for all of this!

rows.label: tlk41700172_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Making amends by letting in refugees?
Well sorry, but that's too little, too late.
I hope we drain them dry!
